response.original_title: Fun to Cook World's Best Food
response.overview: Fun to Cook "World's Best Food" is an experimental film that explores extraterrestrial cuisine. It investigates qualities of Otherness in relation with how humans connect with food. Cooking is not only a method of survival but it contains and reveals mankind's identity through culture and history. The film uses various techniques such as mold casting, compositing, live action, and 3D animation.
response.title: Fun to Cook World's Best Food
